sense.name: Be used by, as of a utiliity; make fit for use.
sense.examples: The sewage plant serviced the neighboring community. The garage serviced to shelter the horses. The washing machine needs to be serviced. The bank will continue to service the loans. What's needed to service the power conscious mobile video marketplace?

sense.name: Mate with; sexually gratify.
sense.examples: Male animals service the females for breeding purposes. Prisoners are forced to service guards for access to medical care.
